lead_paragraph: Wide receiver Troy Brown signed with the New England Patriots for a 15th season yesterday, giving him a chance to increase his team record of 557 catches. Brown, 36, has spent his entire career with the Patriots since being drafted in the eighth round out of Marshall in 1993.
